name: Sasquatch, say cheese!
description:
Hang out in the forest with a very sassy Sasquatch, and take their photo if you feel like it. That's it—that's all there is.

CONTROLS:
Look around with your mouse, and take/hide photos with Spacebar.

Sasquatch, say cheese! was a 10-hour prototype made for the NYU Game Center's "Prototype Studio" course, with the prompt of "Portrait."

Music by Monplaisir
